verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: apparently] [V: stood] [ARG2: by his campaign calls for a " Muslim ban "] [ARGM-LOC: in a news conference with Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARGM-ADV: telling a reporter he has " nothing to apologize for " regarding his rhetoric] .

President Donald Trump apparently stood by [ARG0: his campaign] [V: calls] [ARG1: for a " Muslim ban "] in a news conference with Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari on Monday , telling a reporter he has " nothing to apologize for " regarding his rhetoric .
